overview: Simon, wrecked by a love sorrow, overflows with sadness. He literally starts to shed all the tears of his whole body. Constantly soaked head to foot, he has to face this new physical state that he’s incapable to stop. An encounter will allow him to take a step back from his pain, to point to another perception of sorrow.

production_companies.name: Médiadiffusion - Atelier de Production de l'IAD

tagline: Following a love sorrow, Simon's sadness is so big it overflows. It overflows his whole body. An encounter will allow him to take a step back from his pain, to point to another perception of sorrow.
title: Simon Cries
